about.description: Automa is a chrome extension for browser automation. From auto-fill forms, doing a repetitive task, taking a screenshot, to scraping data of the website, it's up to you what you nt to do with this extension.
about.thanks: Thanks to everyone who has submitted issues, made suggestions, and generally helped make this a better project.
